article: I have a beautiful mother. She is very busy every day. She gets up at five o'clock. She _ her teeth and takes a shower .Then she makes a nice meal for my father and _ Then we eat breakfast at half past six. My father works in a hospital. He is busy too. He can't take me to school, so my mother takes me to school in her car . It takes us twenty minutes to get to school. Sometimes I ride a bike. The bike ride is about 40 minutes. I'm never late for school. After school, my mother comes to the school to take me. She drives _ . She is good at driving. When we get home, she does some work in the rooms. And then she watches TV for one and a half _ Then she goes to bed at half past nine. She is busy every day, but she is happy. I love my mother.
